title: North Korea announces first Covid deaths amid 'explosive' outbreak - CNN
content:
1. North Korea announces first Covid deaths amid 'explosive' outbreak  CNN
  2. North Korea confirms 1st COVID outbreak, Kim orders lockdown  The Associated Press
  3. North Korea Reveals First Covid Death, 'Explosive' Fever Spread  Bloomberg
  4. North Korea admitting to its first COVID 19 case: CBS News Flash May 12, 2022  CBS News
  5. N. Korea reports 6 deaths after admitting COVID-19 outbreak  The Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: North Korea has announced an "explosive" Covid-19 outbreak that has likely killed six people and infected more than 350,000, according to state media, prompting fears of an impending and deadly crisis in the isolated and impoverished nation.
